preconditions.precondition: Archivist has selected an embargoed item

mainSequence.step: DigitalRecords Archivist selects an embargoed item
UI requests embargo details from Embargo Management System
Embargo Management System retrieves embargo information from Database
Database returns embargo information to Embargo Management System
Embargo Management System displays embargo details to UI
DigitalRecords Archivist inputs new embargo length
UI sends update embargo length request to Embargo Management System
Embargo Management System updates embargo information in the database
Database confirms the update to Embargo Management System
Embargo Management System displays success message to UI
UI shows confirmation to DigitalRecords Archivist
